about_the_game:
UNIQUE UNIVERSE

Discover a twisted version of Spain where folklore and history come together to give life to Tormentosa, a mysterious town baptized by the sea. Will you be able to survive the terrifying heresy that inhabits therein?


INTRIGUING PLOT

Let yourself be trapped by a dark and carefully crafted storyline in which nothing and no one are what they seem. Put together the pieces of the puzzle to unravel the terrifying truth that was born more than a thousand years ago.


BLOOD-LEECHING WEAPONS

Your weapons are thirsty of blood instead of bullets. Sacrifice your own life to defeat the profane creatures that threaten you, but keep a constant eye on your health or you will bleed to death.


LEGACY POWERS

Absorb the blood of the inhabitants of Tormentosa and you will not only recover your vitality, but you will also seize important memories from their past that will allow you to solve the riddles of the town.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 26 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements may change over the course of development.

short_description: What would you do if your blood were your only weapon? How much would you sacrifice your life? Experience the unholy island of Tormentosa in this twisted first-person adventure full of horror and action where only your blood can be used to defeat the impious creatures that roam therein.

English*, Spanish - Spain*
